Experiment Method.Assay Method: Reporter gene assay (EGFP with let-7-binding sites)

Material used.Description: EGFP reporter constructs with let-7-binding sites were used in Drosophila and human cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Pathogenic I1915T and G2019S variants increased EGFP reporter expression compared to wild-type controls.
Pathogenic G2019S variant increased EGFP reporter expression compared to wild-type controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or non-pathogenic variants were used as negative controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: EGFP expression level comparable to wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: EGFP expression level significantly higher than wild-type controls.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: RNAi knockdown and kinase activity assays

Material used.Description: RNAi was used to knock down LRRK2 or Argonaute proteins in cell lines and Drosophila models.

Readout description.Result Description: RNAi knockdown of LRRK2 or Argonaute proteins reduced the effect of I1915T and G2019S variants.
RNAi knockdown of LRRK2 or Argonaute proteins reduced the effect of G2019S variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or non-pathogenic variants were used as negative controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein activity comparable to wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein activity significantly altered compared to wild-type controls.
